Administration
                                        
    		Master of Business Administration
    	Chico State has been offering a Master of Business Administration (MBA) degree since 1968. Our AACSB accredited and affordable MBA program is consistently ranked among the best value in the country.        Campus-Based and Online MBA ProgramsOur MBA program is offered as a campus-based or online MBA(opens in new window) program and offers four degree options:General MBA (campus and online)Enterprise Information Systems - now a STEM Degree (campus only)Project Management (campus and online)Health Services Administration (online only)Program Similarities Same AACSB-accredited degree.Same degree requirements and curriculum.GRE/GMAT waived.Faculty engage students with case study, lecture, and project work to elevate graduate student's competitive edge for career advancement.Transcripts from both programs simply state that you have an MBA from Chico State. Program DifferencesCampus-Based MBAThree degree options:
General MBAProject ManagementEnterprise Information SystemsOffers more choices for elective course selection.On-campus classes (depending on COVID-19 restrictions).Welcomes International Students from all over the world.
International Education and Global EngagementInternational ApplicationSemester long courses with frequent interaction with faculty face-to-face on a weekly basis.MBA degree may be completed in two years.Online MBAThree degree options:
General MBAProject ManagementHealth Services Administration(opens in new window)100% online and fully asynchronous.Most courses are 6 weeks in length. FAST (Focused. Applied. Strategic Training) Elective Courses: 3 weeks in length; 1.5 units eachTypically completed in 18-23 months.Engaging, optional live session each week.Courses, Prerequisites, & RequirementsCampus-Based MBA Curriculum(opens in new window)Online MBA Curriculum(opens in new window)How to ApplyApplications for both the campus-based and online MBA programs are completed through CalState Apply.With one of the lowest average student debt amounts in the country, Chico State offers one of the nation’s highest return on investment.Apply to Chico State(opens in new window)Questions? Contact Us!Campus MBA Program Advisormba@csuchico.edu 530-898-4480Online MBA Program Advisoronlinemba@csuchico.edu 1-833-554-0603International Applicants apply@csuchico.edu+1-530-898-5415MBA Quick LinksHomepageOnline MBA Program(opens in new window)Domestic ApplicantsInternational ApplicantsProgram Options and RequirementsPrerequisitesScholarships, Costs, and GrantsFAQsMBA NewsMBA Graduate Shares Inspiring Educational JourneyBusiness Alumnus Brings Biotech to ChicoCSU, Chico MBA Students Have 100 Percent Pass Rate for CAPM CertificationCSU, Chico MBA Option in Enterprise Information Systems is Now a STEM DegreeMBA Students Visit Verizon Innovation LabSee all MBA NewsJoin our MBA programFall Semester: Apply Oct 1 - April 29Spring Semester: Apply Aug 1 - Sep 15College of BusinessTehama Hall 301 530-898-6272bus@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/cobSupport our College(opens in new window)Program PortfolioDepartmentsInformation Systems, Finance & AccountingManagementMarketingMBA Program
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
